name: Amai Mahou Shoujo
description:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: This game is not suitable for children, or those who are easily disturbed. For a full list of content warnings, please see below.

Click to reveal content warnings (May contain spoilers)
  • Bullying
  • Violence
  • Killing/Death

After encountering a talking donut, Amai becomes a magical girl - girls who protect the world against terrifying monsters. However, she soon discovers that her only power is to conjure candy...

A short visual novel featuring about 2,700~ words and 6 different endings.

Made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #6.
